extendedInfo.description: busuu.com, the leading online community for language learning, brings you the perfect app to learn Portuguese on the go:â° In the latest release - Discounted offer to activate all courses! â Extensive vocabulary - over 3,000 words and key phrasesâ From beginner to advanced intermediate levels (A1 - B2)â Covering 150 different topics using day-to-day situationsâ Comprehensive audio-visual learning material with photos and recordings by native speakersâ Sections include vocabulary, dialogues and interactive testsâ No internet connection requiredâ Free version includes 20 complete learning units - full content can be purchased inside the app!â Learning progress can be synchronized with your profile on busuu.com, the famous online community for learning languages with over 15,000,000 usersâ Only language learning app in the world which includes direct interaction with native speakersâ Submit your writing exercises and get corrected by native speakers from our communityâ Enjoy the latest learning contentâ Now also supports Japanese and Mandarin as interface languagesâ New Travel CourseWhat our mobile app users say about us in their reviews:"You can learn at your own pace. Very useful!""Easy to learn and easy to understand""It is a super fun tool where you learn and interact with other people""This application is really great to learn. I love the correction by natives, practising with native speakers for free. Super app""This is better than my Rosetta Stone Spanish! It is more fun and it is free as opposed to the 500 plus dollars I paid for RS. I highly recommend this app!!""The application is simply super, languages are taught like a game! Very helpful comments from other users on your exercises. Bought a Premium package without hesitation!"

reviews.title: Perfect for beginners
reviews.comment: Better than babbel & the others I have tried that only give you words but not sentences & how to use in conversation

reviews.comment: Ol\303\240, bom dia! I\'m already starting to learn!!!

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Me ayudo aprender lo basico atleast! Love it!

reviews.title: Helpful for practising
reviews.comment: Great for some quick practice on my commute

reviews.title: Great.
reviews.comment: Great to learn other languages.

reviews.comment: Muy bueno.

reviews.title: Big thanks to the creator
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t get any personal than this, it is like a personal trainer you always wanted to have but couldn\'t find what\'s more it doesn\'t laugh at you to make you uncomfortable
reviews.author: Cecil Rodrigues

reviews.title: Awesome!!!
reviews.comment: It\'s really helpful to me. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to learn another language!

reviews.comment: Clear fun and relevant

reviews.comment: This is great I\'ve learned a lot in one hour than I have for a few months

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: This is the first app I\'ve found that teaches grammar and allows you to practice with reviewed feedback, instead of a few words or phrases to memorize. I love it! Worth every penny!
reviews.author: Mikenzie Lewis

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I like it!

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Great for easy learning and basics

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Hands down a great app to learn another language.  I love it.

reviews.comment: Loove it

reviews.title: !! Great app!!
reviews.comment: Great app. Nice design. Very few faults so far.  Highly recommend it to others wanting to learn Portuguese

reviews.comment: It is a great app which teaches one the basics as well as some advance levels. You should definitely check it out

reviews.title: This site

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I would prefer to have the app in french like on my pc. But I do also my best. And there are some functions who could also be better!! You really think that people learn just on pc?? I bought this app for learn with my smartphone so please develop it better thanks!! Or I ll change...
